name: Team XTZ Trading CARDS 1: CEYLON METAVERSE
description:
Team XTZ - is not a team. 

It's an idea. It works like this: 

1) Create and Boost Quality Artwork Daily
2) Treat Fans and Buyers like GOLD!
3) Positive and Fun Twitter Presence
4) Enrich the TEZOS ecosystem, so that everyone prospers

When we make the TEZOS creative space a fun positive engaging place to be — that is full of great art - then buyers and people outside the NFT space, can check us out and become new our customers, fans, and collectors. 

We can actively grow the creative side of TEZ through daily acts of positive quality engagement and creative work, while collaborating and connecting with likeminded artists - GLOBALLY. 

As TEZ grows — the $$ value for all buyers and creators will GROW.

So this is 'mindset' not a team, but the hashtag #TeamXTZ 
was created to crystalize the importance of that mindset in everything we do as independent TEZ-based artists and creators in a global 24/7 Marketplace.

There is no team to join, it’s just an idea. Anyone can do it!

It’s simple but powerful. 

For fun- and cross-promotion - I am making these trading cards as promo items. ANYONE can reach out to me and I'll make you your own card and gift it to you! 

Best of luck to all indie creators in the TEZOVERSE globally - let's make some dreams come true!

HP LoveBux
